ABOUT.LABEL: Who I Am
ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DETAILS: Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? What is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills?
ABOUT.LOCATION: Where are you based? Would you be open to working remotely or potentially relocating?
ABOUT.LEARNING: Show that you are open-minded. Are you enthusiastic about learning new technologies and continually improving your skills?
ABOUT.PROBLEM_SOLVING: A brief description of your problem-solving approach. Do you learn from each challenge as you search for the most efficient or elegant solution? You can include some keywords like analytical thinking, creativity, persistence, and collaboration.

CONTACT.HEADING: Contact Me
CONTACT.QUESTION: Got a problem to solve?
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Need a Frontend developer? Let's talk! I’ll help bring your ideas to life with clean, modern, and responsive code.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_LABEL: I’ve read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data.
CONTACT.SUCCESS: Thanks! I’ll get back to you soon
CONTACT.ERROR_REQUIRED: You must fill in the field.
CONTACT.ERROR_PRIVACY: You must agree to the privacy policy.

TECHNOLOGIES.TITLE: Technologies
TECHNOLOGIES.DESCRIPTION: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies. Show how important it is for you to keep up with the rapid changes in web development.
TECHNOLOGIES.QUESTION: You need another skill?
TECHNOLOGIES.CONTACT_NOTE: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

PROJECTS.SUBTITLE: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

LEGAL.TITLE: Imprint

LEGAL.INDEMNITY_TEXT: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the listed students, the Developer Akademie, and their affiliates, partners, officers, directors, agents, and employees from any claim, demand, loss, damage, cost, or liability (including reasonable legal fees) arising out of or related to your use of the Portfolio and/or your breach of this Legal Notice.
